profile: Partner, Technical Recruiter at Proven Recruiting

Senior Technical Recruiter August 2018 - Present  (2 years 3 months) Greater San Diego Area
Specialize in direct hire, contract and contract to hire placement of talented
professionals in Technology with the following skill sets/titles:
• Full Stack Web Developers
• JavaScript (Angular, Node, React)
• Native and Hybrid Mobile Developers (iOS and Android)
• DevOps
• DB Developer(SQL, ETL, Oracle, NoSQL, Mongo, etc)
• QA Engineer (Automation)
• Technical/Desktop/Customer Support
• UX/UI Developers & Designers
Responsibilities:
• Identify and build relationships with talented professionals in technology to
assist them in their job search
• Build, maintain and expand rapport with prospective and current clients via
telephone, in-person meetings, and email
• Identify and qualify meaningful leads, providing a consultative and value-
added approach to developing client relationships
• Power user with Bullhorn CRM, inputting, editing, and managing client and
candidate profiles, running customized reports to determine strategic and
functional opportunities
Happy to help on your search. Please feel free to reach out at (858) 412-1148
